_header: Be thou not too bold to blame / Lest thou be found the same
Note: Followed by 1833 and 835; cf. lines 17 seqq. of 712.

BodLauMis108.Transcription:
Be þu nauȝt to bolde to blame Leste þu be founde in
                    þe same[L]oue god and drede shame& so in worship kepe þi
                    name
